articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Battalion under KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Battalion under KPA Unit
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected the second battalion under KPA Unit 1973 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment on Saturday.
					Kim Jong Un gave a pair of binoculars, an automatic rifle and a machine gun to the first company of the battalion as gifts before having a photo session with its service personnel of the battalion.
					
					After being briefed on the monument to the field guidance to the battalion by President Kim Il Sung on February 8, 1974 and by leader Kim Jong Il on April 9, 2000, he looked round the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					He said the immortal exploits of the Generalissimos would always shine along with the colors of the unit.
					
					At a military lecture room he received a report on the combat duty of the battalion, its readiness to go into action and its training.
					
					After examining the combat plan with keen attention, he said that only when all the combatants know about the enemies' military targets and the puppet reactionary ruling quarters like the back of their own hands and are well informed of their features, can they storm the strongholds of the enemies in a flash and deal deadly blows at the heart of the enemies at once in case of emergency.
					
					As the combatants should fight in the enemy-controlled areas without any flank and rear, it is necessary to conduct effective drills on topography among them so that they may have a correct understanding of the terrain, he said, underscoring the need to prepare them as one-match-for-a-hundred fighters with marksmanship of never missing targets and strong physical bodies.
					
					The commanding officers should help soldiers be always aware that a war may break out after this moment and be concerned and thoughtful of whether there is any weak point in combat preparedness and whether the combatants are fully prepared to perform their duty in the enemy-controlled areas, he said.
					
					He underlined the need for the officers to train all the combatants to be master hands and stalwart soldiers in a modern war by intensifying the drills. 
					
					"Our Party trusts you," he noted, calling on them to demonstrate the true fighting spirit of the People's Army and its will to wipe out the enemy by striking the heart of the enemy before any others, if they greet a great revolutionary event for national reunification. 
					
					He urged them to deal uninterrupted heavy blows at the enemies in that event, not allowing them to come to their senses, and annihilate them to the last man.
					
					He went round a bean store of the battalion.
					
					Recalling that Kim Jong Il asked about bean farming whenever he visited units, Kim Jong Un called on it to reap a rich harvest in bean farming this year.
					
					He went round a library and a lecture room of O Jung Hup Political University.
					
					At the library he underlined the need to establish the habit of revolutionary study among soldiers and raise the rate of use of books so that they may read many more books.
					
					He asked about the subjects of lectures given at the university and teaching staff in detail and taught ways of improving teaching to suit the psychology and characters of combat soldiers, showing deep care for O Jung Hup Universities of the large combined units.
					
					Kim Jong Un went round an education room, bed room and mess hall and other entertainment and supply service facilities of the Kim Sun Son hero company under the battalion.
					
					At the education room he said that the voice of the Party should always be heard in the company, cell of the People's Army and main combat unit.
					
					He said in an excited tone that he feels very pleased when meeting commanding officers taking good care of soldiers whom the Party values and loves so much as he entrusted those soldiers to them and feels worth inspecting units as Supreme Commander when seeing service personnel well fed and happy.
					
					Then he guided the training of soldiers of the battalion.
					
					Watching brave soldiers in training, he was greatly satisfied to see them fully prepared in military technique and physically. He highly appreciated their success in training and set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for bolstering up the combat capability in every way.
					
					He organized and guided a pistol and automatic rifle firing drill of the battalion commanding officers without prior notice on the same day.
					
					He said that the combatants should acquire marksmanship of never missing targets while preparing themselves politically and ideologically and in militarily technique and physically. He taught the knack of all hits.
					
					He instructed the Military Science Documentary Film Studio of the Korean People's Army to produce a video dealing with varieties of shooting methods and send it to the whole army so that the Juche-oriented combat shooting methods may be coordinated.
					
					He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Hwang Pyong So and Son Chol Ju.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Participants in 250-Mile Journey for Learning
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Participants in 250-Mile Journey for Learning
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent gifts to members of the group of school youth and children from across the country who took part in the 250-mile journey for learning.
					Kim Jong Un made sure that the journey was made so that school youth and children can deeply grasp the revolutionary life and immortal exploits of great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. He sent a helicopter with gifts aboard to the members of the group.
					
					They left Phophyong on Mar. 16 and arrived in Songwon on Saturday along the footsteps traversed by Kim Il Sung and the course of the journey initiated by Kim Jong Il .
					
					A ceremony for conveying the gifts took place on the spot.
					
					Present there were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials concerned and members of the group.
					
					The gifts sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un were delivered.
					
					Speeches were made at the ceremony.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Threatens Warmongers with Counteraction
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Threatens Warmongers with Counteraction
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released the information bulletin No. 1024 Saturday.
					It says:
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are staging the madcap joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle in south Korea, defying strong protest and denunciation by the public at home and abroad.
					
					The Foal Eagle joint military exercises that will run through till the end of April involve more than 10,000 U.S. forces and over 200,000 south Korean army as well as huge nuclear war means such as nuclear strategic bomber and nuclear-armed submarine. A variety of drills for attacking simulated targets of the DPRK are being waged in the sky, land and seas.
					
					The north-targeted war rehearsal is a serious provocation against the DPRK and an open challenge to the warnings served by it.
					
					There is no such precedent in which two-month long war exercises have been waged in areas close to the other party with the mobilization of hundreds of thousands of troops and the state-of-the-art war means armed with nuclear bombs and live shells as the U.S. and the south Korean forces are doing now.
					
					The DPRK already stated to the world that it will counter the U.S. and south Korea's provocation of a new war with an all-out war and would not rule out a preemptive attack.
					
					Time has passed when only words were made.
					
					The DPRK will counter force with force, precision strike with super precision strike and nuke with nuke.
					
					The enemies will be gravely mistaken if they take as just threats the strong spirit of annihilating enemies and the grudge of the army and people of the DPRK all out to uphold the order of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the great illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					Whether it is nuclear strategic bomber or nuclear-armed submarine that comes in attack against the DPRK, they can never evade the super precision strikes to be mounted by the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					The enemies should clearly understand that things will not just end in smoke in the present era of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is resolute in determination and merciless in strike, determined to wipe out enemies at a stroke.
					
					The U.S. should behave with discretion, bearing in mind that it does not have the monopoly of nuclear and other ultra-modern weapons.
					
					Those who run amuck in the moves for a war against the DPRK will never be able to evade stern punishment.

articles.title: DPRK Strives to Put Meteorological Observation on IT Basis
articles.content:
DPRK Strives to Put Meteorological Observation on IT Basis
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- March 23 is World Meteorological Day and the 50th anniversary of the World Weather Watch.
					To mark the day, the World Meteorological Organization set the theme for this year as "Watching the Weather to Protect Life and Property".
					
					In recent years climate change has come up as a more serious matter to be urgently dealt with worldwide.
					
					90 percent of natural disasters, 70 percent of human casualties and 80 percent of economic losses the world suffered over the past 30 years were caused by tropical cyclones, hurricanes, drought and flood.
					
					In this regard the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has directed big efforts to putting weather forecast on a scientific basis.
					
					Efforts are concentrated on the research into securing the numerical weather forecast. 
					
					Topocentric data collected by the Academy of Agricultural Science and other related units have been used for weather observation.
					
					Meanwhile, automatic observation facilities are to be installed at observation stations in Pyongyang and local areas this year.

articles.title: Pyongyang Secondary School Graduates Meet for Poem Reciting and Concert
articles.content:
Pyongyang Secondary School Graduates Meet for Poem Reciting, Concert
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Graduates from secondary schools in Pyongyang who had volunteered to serve at forefront posts met at the Youth Park Open-air Theater from March 19 to 23 for poem reciting and concert "Country and youth."
					The venue was crowded with students determined to turn out in the sacred war for defending the country and wipe out the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces who are bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the country.
					
					Agitation based on a true story and chorus "Song of National Defense" was followed by story telling by war veterans and discharged soldiers. They deeply touched the graduates.
					
					The graduates sang the song of advance for victory, which the heroes sang in the rigorous days of war and which will reverberate far and wide on this land through generations, hardening their resolution to give steady continuity to the ever-victorious tradition.
					
					In duet and chorus "For My Only Country" the graduates impressively represented the unshakable faith and will of the younger generation to firmly protect the country at the cost of their lives just as Hero Ri Su Bok did. He made a breakthrough in his unit's charge by silencing the enemy pillbox with his body during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					Poems and songs replete with ardent patriotism and passion of youth resounded through in succession and the graduates evinced their resolution.
					
					The volunteers including the graduates from Kim Ju Hyok Secondary School and Ri Chol Min Secondary School pledged to become self-blasting fighters and human bombs throwing themselves to blow up the stronghold of the enemy before any others.

articles.title: Korean National Association
articles.content:
Korean National Association
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 96th anniversary of the Korean National Association, formed by Kim Hyong Jik who was an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea.
					The association, a clandestine organization, set it as its goal to achieve Korea's independence by united efforts of the entire nation and build a genuine civilized state. 
					
					It was an underground anti-Japanese revolutionary organization, the largest among those formed by the Korean patriots at home and abroad before or after the March First Popular Uprising. 
					
					Kim Hyong Jik advanced the idea of "Jiwon (Aim High)" calling for liberating the country by fighting through generations, and conducted energetic activities as the pioneer and leader of the national liberation movement.
					
					The anti-Japanese movement in Korea was inactive in the 1910s due to the nationalists' separatist and sycophantic moves. 
					
					Such circumstances prompted him to form a strong revolutionary organization capable of creditably guiding the anti-Japanese national liberation movement. 
					
					After making full preparations, he declared the formation of the Korean National Association (KNA) on March 23, Juche 6 (1917). 
					
					The KNA was a revolutionary umbrella organization that stood firmly against imperialism and for independence and had a closely-knit network of organizations.
					
					It was thoroughly concealed by means of such lawful fringe organizations as School Association, Stone Monument Association and Home-town Association. Its organizational network spread throughout the country and even reached abroad. 
					
					The organization involved people from all walks of life like workers, peasants, teachers, soldiers (of the Independence Army), shopkeepers, religious believers and artisans. 
					
					It made big contributions to developing the anti-Japanese national liberation movement from nationalist movement to proletarian revolution and attaining the cohesion of the anti-Japanese independentists.
					
					A monument to the KNA was built in Hakdanggol at the foot of Jangdae Hill in Pyongyang.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Evade Blame for Grave Situation in Korea: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Evade Blame for Grave Situation in Korea: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is escalating the confrontation by describing the DPRK's just countermeasures for self-defense as "provocation" and "threat".
					Recently high-ranking officials of the U.S. vied with each other to talk rubbish that the U.S. is concerned over the bellicose remarks of the north and this is "defamation of the efforts of the international community to ensure lasting peace and stability". This rhetoric is intended to create impression that the DPRK's countermeasures put peace and stability in the region at peril and escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					This is nothing but sophism turning black into white.
					
					This cannot be construed otherwise than a foolish ploy to pass the buck for the present crisis caused by their sinister moves to stifle the DPRK to it and stir up an atmosphere of putting international pressure upon it.
					
					The U.S. is the arch criminal that prodded the UN into slapping "sanctions" against the DPRK by labeling its satellite launch for peaceful economic development as illegal action and violation of law and compelled it to conduct an underground nuclear test and nullify the Armistice Agreement.
					
					Despite the DPRK's repeated warnings, the U.S. kicked off large-scale war maneuvers for aggression, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase of confrontation and the brink of war.
					
					The U.S. trumpeting about "provocation" and "threat" from the north in disregard of the stark fact is no more than a pretext to justify its aggressive hostile policy toward the DPRK and step it up.
					
					The U.S. is a war provocateur and wrecker of peace and stability as it has brought such misfortune and pain to the Korean people through its ceaseless sanctions and moves to stifle the DPRK and threat of aggression for such a long period.
					
					On the eve of the DPRK's nuclear test for which the U.S. and other hostile forces put "sanctions" against the DPRK and termed "provocation", the U.S. Army Academy conducted "2013 War Game"  in a bid to stifle the DPRK.
					
					In south Korea, U-2 and hundreds of airmen have monitored the DPRK's military communication, movements of units and preparations for nuclear and missile tests every day since 1976.
					
					Even under the prevailing situation where acute confrontation may lead to a total war, the U.S. is busy openly staging nuclear strike maneuvers against the DPRK under the simulated conditions of an actual war with strategic bombers, nuclear-powered submarines and other nuclear strike means involved, crying out for "strong counteraction." 
					
					The U.S. introduction of "three major nuclear mainstays" and "three major nuclear strike means" which it brandishes as means of blackmail and its bellicose remarks are an undisguised nuclear blackmail against the DPRK and the biggest threat to it.
					
					It was none other than the U.S. that brought an era of nuclear confrontation to this land.
					
					Its catastrophic consequences will not be confined to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. and other hostile forces are to blame for the worst nuclear crisis threatening the peninsula, the first of its kind in the confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. This is entirely attributable to the U.S. moves for a war against the DPRK and use of its legitimate satellite launch and nuclear test for self-defense as an opportunity to stifle it.
					
					The U.S. can never evade the responsibility for this crisis.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Japanese Politicians' Coarse Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Japanese Politicians' Coarse Invectives against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are stepping up the racket for confrontation with the DPRK.
					The chief Cabinet secretary at a press conference vowed to "tighten siege to the DPRK" and the chairman of the Joint Staff Council of the "Self-Defense Forces" cried out for "maintaining a high alert" while talking about the "violation of UN Security Council's resolution".
					
					This is an outcry of those who have lost reasoning power in the face of the DPRK's declaration of its strong will to take the toughest counteraction. This is aimed to improve their image by taking the advantage of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and step up the moves for stifling it.
					
					This rhetoric is timed to coincide with the submission to the U.S. Senate of an "annual report" which portrayed the DPRK's exercise of its right to self-defence as a "provocation" and "threat".
					
					The Japanese reactionaries have persisted in the racket for confrontation with the DPRK, pursuant to the U.S. policy of hostility toward it.
					
					The Japanese conservative politicians stoop to any infamy to please their master and improve their image, staking their fate on escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					Their rhetoric is nothing but a hysteric fit of mentally deranged and die-hard sycophants.
					
					Irony is that Japanese Prime Minister Abe is taking the lead. He unhesitatingly made such bluff that "switchover in policy should be made" and "U.S. should not be made fun of". He even talked about "collapse".
					
					Such invectives are too coarse to be made by the head of state.
					
					His remarks damage Japan's face which looks to becoming a "normal state".
					
					At a time when the DPRK's exercise of its right to self-defence is winning support from many countries, the head of a country that neighbors the DPRK openly disclosed his hostility. This proves his deep awareness of confrontation with the DPRK and his base personality.
					
					Absolutely ludicrous are Abe's remarks about "collapse" and "policy switchover".
					
					The measures for self-defence taken by the DPRK were a just counteraction to the illegal high-handed acts of the U.S. and UN Security Council over its legitimate right to satellite launch and nuclear test.
					
					A man who professes the head of a country is sure to know this and if he does not know, skepticism grows over his qualifications.
					
					It is illogical for Japan to say this or that about the DPRK's measure for self-defence. Japan now seeks to make its blood-stained past repeat itself and step up the moves for turning the country into a military giant as evidenced by the launch of a spy satellite. This is an act of encroaching upon the DPRK's sovereignty.
					
					It is tragic that Japan is ruled by such politically half-witted as Abe who is unable to discern the truth and does not have elementary common sense as politician.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will as in the past never pardon those who let loose the whole gamut of vituperation and coarse invectives insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and finding fault with its measure for defending sovereignty.
					
					If Abe and other Japanese politicians continue wagging their tongues, thinking that they can stay outside the firing range of the DPRK, that will precipitate their destruction.

articles.title: DPRK Feels No Need for Dialogue with U.S.: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Feels No Need for Dialogue with U.S.: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Recently high-ranking officials of the U.S. vied with each other to talk such rubbish that "the U.S. can not recognize north Korea's access to nukes and there can be no reward." 
					Minju Joson Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					A string of jargons let loose by high-ranking officials of the world's "only superpower" sound ridiculous rather than resentful as they are against common sense.
					
					It is nonsensical for the U.S. to claim that the DPRK had access to nuclear weapons to use them as a political bargaining chip to get economic reward from the U.S.
					
					The DPRK acquired nuclear deterrent for self-defence, overcoming difficulties and tightening belt for several decades. This nuclear deterrent serves as weaponry of independence and justice for foiling the hostile forces' schemes to stifle the DPRK, protecting its sovereignty and dignity and combating all sorts of evils on the earth.
					
					It is a paradox, indeed, to think that the DPRK would barter the above-said deterrent with such noble mission for a petty amount of U.S. dollars.
					
					It was none other than the U.S. which compelled the DPRK to have access to nukes. Yet, the former is employing sleight of hand to prod the latter into a dirty bargaining, failing to come to its senses. This is, indeed, self-contradictory. 
					
					Gone are the days when issues related to the DPRK-U.S. relations could be dealt with through dialogue. The former has nothing to talk with the latter any longer.
					
					The DPRK doesn't feel any need for dialogue with the U.S. as neither words nor logic makes the latter understandable.
					
					It is the strong determination of the army and people of the DPRK to successfully conclude the decades-long confrontation with the U.S. by arms of Songun.

articles.title: World Meteorological Day Marked: Minju Joson
articles.content:
World Meteorological Day Marked: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Saturday dedicates a bylined article to World Meteorological Day.
					It is a very urgent issue to put weather forecast and monitoring on a new scientific basis under the condition in which abnormal weather often affects the entire earth, the article says, and goes on:
					
					Diverse events are taking place in the DPRK on World Meteorological Day.
					
					The DPRK is conducting active information campaign and, at the same time, imparting with speed to people information needed for their work and life, mainly the trend of the recent climate change and features of climate change in the country.
					
					In line with correct policies of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government, the hydro-meteorological field of the DPRK is working hard to put weather forecast on a scientific basis and modernize equipment so as to protect the life and property of the people from natural disasters.
					
					In this course many achievements have been made in the work to put on a higher stage hydro-meteorological activities including researches into meteorology and the introduction of modern observation means into weather forecast.
					
					Particularly, the radar system for observing clouds has been established to lay a scientific foundation for timely forecasting unexpected weather.
					
					The DPRK will continue to work hard to make greater progress in hydro-meteorological work to help economic construction and improvement of people's living standard, and further strengthen cooperation with relevant international bodies including the World Meteorological Organization.

articles.title: Danger of Nuclear War Increases on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Danger of Nuclear War Increases on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean warmongers are staging large-scale DPRK-targeted joint military exercises amid the tension mounting on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined commentary.
					Terming this the worst military provocation and undisguised threat of aggression on the DPRK, the commentary goes on:
					
					The focus of the drills is being put on increasing the combined and coordinated operation capability between the U.S. aggression forces and the south Korean puppet army units, pursuant to the attempt for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK and rounding off overall war preparations.
					
					The operations for removing nuclear weapons staged under the simulated conditions of "counterattack operation" and "emergency situation in the north" prove the attack-oriented program and the aggression-minded nature of the drills.
					
					What merits more serious attention is that even though the Key Resolve joint military exercises have ended, Foal Eagle will go on till the end of April, raising the strong wind of a nuclear war.
					
					Foal Eagle which involves a special operation drill and a field mobile drill is a typical actual maneuver for attack. Herein lie its feature distinguished from Key Resolve and greater danger.
					
					The danger of a nuclear war is increasing on the Korean Peninsula, instead of disappearing with Key Resolve.
					
					The time bomb of a nuclear war planted by Key Resolve may explode any moment during the frantic Foal Eagle.
					
					Provokers should be beaten back with arms only, not with words.
					
					The DPRK has already removed all hindrances standing in the way of waging the sacred revolutionary war for national reunification, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Danger of Story of "Provocation by North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Danger of Story of "Provocation by North"
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The "story of provocation by the north" spread by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces is a fiction to justify their criminal "sanctions" and war provocation against the DPRK, pass the buck for the prevailing serious situation to the DPRK and do harm to its idea and social system. 
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					The story of "provocation by the north" is sophism to cover up the U.S. and puppet warmongers' vicious ambition and moves to invade the north.
					
					Provocation is made by the U.S. and its allies who are committing criminal act of creating an extreme danger of a war with huge nuclear armed forces involved by pulling up the DPRK over the exercise of its legitimate sovereignty and relying on  unprecedented economic "sanctions" and pressure racket. 
					
					However vocal, they can never justify their policy for confrontation with the DPRK and cover up their vicious nature.  
					
					It is an invariable ambition of the U.S. to seize south Korea as the bridgehead for realizing the strategy of world hegemony and dominate the whole of Korea.
					
					The U.S. has now become vocal than ever before about "provocation by the north" citing the DPRK's satellite launch and nuclear test.
					
					The south Korean puppet forces are openly currying favor with and dancing to the tune of their master U.S. which is working hard to perpetuate its forces' presence in south Korea and ignite a nuclear war against the north. 
					
					Under the serious situation, all the compatriots at home and abroad and progressive humankind are clearly seeing through the deception of the story of "provocation by the north".
					
					The story will turn into a funeral music inviting the miserable self-destruction of the U.S. and south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan War Drills in Forefront Area
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan War Drills in Forefront Area
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The 3rd corps of the south Korean army announced that it would stage joint exercises in So-myon and Kalmal and Kimhwa towns of Cholwon, south Korean Kangwon Province from March 25 to 29, according to south Korean KBS.
					The warmongers declared that the exercises will include a drill for increasing operation capabilities.
					
					They will coincide with the combined drills to be staged by the 1st crops of the puppet army from March 25 to 29 in the forefront area north of Kyonggi Province such as Koyang and Phaju. This is an undisguised provocation and blatant challenge to the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities Urged to Apologize for War Crimes
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities Urged to Apologize for War Crimes
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- 16 peace movement organizations of south Korea held a joint press conference on March 19 ten years since the U.S. imperialists' invasion of Iraq.
					The organizations recalled that the Bush administration in league with its satellite forces kicked off a military attack on Iraq on March 20, 2003 under the pretext of eliminating WMDs and bringing democracy to Iraq.
					
					But WMDs were not discovered in the country and the war only brought a miserable fate to Iraqis such as horror, poverty, civilian genocide and joblessness, they deplored, and went on:
					
					One of the main aims sought by the U.S. in starting the war was to rob Iraq of oil and the U.S. admitted this itself.
					
					They demanded the U.S. admit its war crimes and apologize for them, though belatedly, and bring Bush and other arch criminals to a war crimes tribunal.
					
					South Korea can never evade the responsibility for the criminal Iraqi war as recognized by the world, they said.
					
					They denounced the authorities for dispatching huge armed forces to Iraq under the pretext of the alliance with the U.S. and playing a big role in its invasion of Iraq.
					
					The organizations urged the authorities to apologize for their criminal participation in the war and immediately halt the overseas troop dispatch.

articles.title: Unjust Decision of Supreme Court Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unjust Decision of Supreme Court Denounced in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Federation for Democratic Press of south Korea on March 15 made public a commentary in protest against the unjust decision of the "government" Supreme Court against just activities of citizens. 
					The commentary recalled that on Mar. 14 the Supreme Court convicted the activists of the People's Movement for the Sovereignty of Media Subscribers of staging a campaign to boycott the goods produced by the businesses placing orders for ads on Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo in 2008. 
					
					Their activities meant censuring the conservative media for releasing misinformation in support of the "government's" action to import American beef infected with mad cow disease in disregard of the people's health, it said, and went on: 
					
					Nevertheless, the Lee Myung Bak regime desperately suppressed them by mobilizing repressive forces, sparking off public uproar. 
					
					In particular, the prosecution's indictment is a typical example proving the crackdown upon just activities of people for the upkeep of the regime. 
					
					The decision of the Supreme Court, too, was the same anachronistic action to suppress the forces critical of the regime as was committed during the Lee Myung Bak regime.

articles.title: "Emergency Measures" during Park's Dictatorship Declared Illegal
articles.content:
"Emergency Measures" during Park's Dictatorship Declared Illegal
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Constitutional Court of south Korea ruled that the "emergency measures" Nos. 1, 2 and 9 taken during the fascist "yusin" dictatorship are unconstitutional, according to the south Korean MBC on Thursday.
					Park Chung-Hee in January of 1974 announced "emergency measures" Nos. 1 and 2 which banned any act of denying and opposing the "yusin constitution" or calling for its revision or repeal. They also called for arresting, detaining, confiscating and searching for any violator of those measures without any warrant and referring him or her to the emergency court martial.
					
					On the strength of these measures, the "yusin" dictatorial fascist forces mercilessly arrested and imprisoned many patriots, pro-democracy activists, youth and students and punished them by martial law.
					
					In May 1975 Park declared "emergency measure" No. 9 inclusive of all the former emergency measures.
					
					It was wider in its application, more inclusive in its definition and cruel in punishment. By enforcing this repressive measure, the "yusin" regime intensified the crackdown upon people until its fall.
					
					Even after the collapse of "yusin" dictatorship the victims waged strenuous actions for compensation for damage and reinstatement, insisting that the measures were unjust.
					
					Under the public pressure the constitutional court ruled that those fascist measures were illegal in all aspects as they had no validity as law and only infringed upon the people's freedom.

articles.title: S. Koran Authorities Censured by Social Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Censured by Social Organization
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public a commentary on March 19 denouncing the "government" authorities for putting into custody a resident who stood against the U.S. criminals.
					The commentary said that some days ago the south Korean who was engaged in his business activities in Tongduchon was arrested for the reason that he confronted the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					
					It criticized media for airing reports favorable to the U.S. forces side amid tight control.
					
					It said the incident begun as four GIs picked up a quarrel after sexual harassment, adding he took legitimate self-defensive act in reaction to it.
					
					The person who acted for self-defence is painted as an assailant, and the criminals who threatened the life of that person are left untouched. This tragedy will continue unless the shackling south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" is revised, the commentary asserted.
					
					It demanded the authorities immediately set free the illegally detained citizen.

articles.title: Sit-in Strikes against U.S.-S. Korea War Drills Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sit-in Strikes against U.S.-S. Korea War Drills Unabated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Sit-in strikes in protest against the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises are going on in south Korea as part of the joint movement for peace against war amid positive support from people of various circles.
					On March 19 the strikers condemned the Key Resolve joint military drills as the north-targeted war drills, pursuant to OPLAN 5027.
					
					The fact that the drills are involving even nuclear warheads-mounted B-52 clearly proves that the joint war drills are nuclear war maneuvers.
					
					They declared that the greater threat the U.S. poses to the nation by pursuing its hostile policy toward the DPRK and staging war drills for aggression, the more dynamic actions people of various circles should wage to fully uphold and thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Crimes Rampant in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crimes Rampant in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hankuk Ilbo Monday reported about crimes rampant in south Korea.
					According to data released by a development research centre in south Korea, it is the 9th on the world list of murder rate.
					
					At least  27,000 cases of such horrible crimes as robbery, arson and rape were reported in 2010 in south Korea or quadruple of those in 1980.
					
					Sexual abuses are increasing 6 percent every year.
					
					These facts go to prove that south Korean society is a hell on earth where immorality, depravity and crimes stalk and human rights are wantonly violated.

articles.title: U.S. Moves against DPRK Denounced by Japanese Figures
articles.content:
U.S. Moves against DPRK Denounced by Japanese Figures
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Japanese figures released a statement denouncing the U.S. and its allied forces for moving to stifle the DPRK.
					Michihiro Sasaki, representative of the Kyoto General Research Institute, said that the U.S. prodded the UN Security Council to fabricate a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and escalated the tension by waging the war exercises together with the south Korean puppet forces, adding:
					
					The U.S. moves are absolutely intolerable.
					
					The tension has mounted because the UNSC backed the U.S.-proposed "resolution" against the DPRK over its launch of the satellite for peaceful purposes. 
					
					It is the height of double standards that the permanent member nations of the UNSC pulled up the DPRK over the satellite launch even though they made satellite launches and nuclear tests many times.
					
					This amounts to the denial of the right to existence and the sovereignty of the DPRK and the violation of the UN Charter.
					
					It is the just right of the DPRK to bolster up the nuclear deterrent to cope with the aggression moves of the U.S. and its allies.
					
					The final victory is in store for the Korean people.
					
					Sadao Shibano, representative of the Society for the Study of World Situation, laid bare the aggressive nature of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					If the U.S. and its allies continue the moves for stifling the DPRK, that will bring the second Korean War.
					
					They should immediately stop the aggression moves against the DPRK.
					
					Let us not allow the outbreak of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula!
					
					The option for the U.S. is to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: Japanese PM's Reckless Remarks against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese PM's Reckless Remarks against DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries had better behave themselves, keeping in mind that the moment they launch reinvasion of Korea backed by the U.S., they will face a ruin. Rodong Sinmun Saturday warns this in a bylined article. 
					It goes on:
					
					Some time ago, Japanese Prime Minister Abe said the DPRK had better not take as funny what the U.S. says. He also said a bold decision of policy switchover should be taken to pave the way for prosperity. These senseless remarks could be made only by Abe who is steeped in hostility to the DPRK to the marrow of his bones.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries should understand the essence of the situation before opening their mouths, however thick-headed in making politics and facing reality. 
					
					The DPRK warned in advance that Japan is within the striking range of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK and it will never be safe when a war breaks out. Abe talked about "collapse" of the DPRK but he had better think twice before uttering such nonsense.  It is Japan which will face collapse as it goes without principle while blindly following the U.S. 
					
					It is the stance of the DPRK to hasten the building of an economic power unrestrained after possessing strong war deterrence. But, if the hostile forces make provocations against it, it will take strong military counteraction and never pardon them. 
					
					Japan, which committed huge crimes against the Korean people, dare talks this or that about the stronger second and third physical counteractions threatened by the DPRK. The army and people of the DPRK will certainly make Japan pay for those remarks. 
					
					The Japanese reactionaries' move for overseas aggression following a comeback to Korea is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with faggot on their back. 
					
					Japan should make with sincerity an earlier apology and compensation to the Korean people for its crime-woven past.

articles.title: Koreans in CIS Ready to Join in Sacred Patriotic War of Justice
articles.content:
Koreans in CIS Ready to Join in Sacred Patriotic War of Justice
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on March 18 in support of "Appeal to all Koreans" issued by the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK).
					The statement said: At a time when the U.S. and other hostile forces' "sanctions" against the DPRK reached an extreme phase, the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle nuclear war maneuvers are under way against the DPRK with huge armed forces and latest nuclear war equipment involved. These war moves have pushed the situation on the Korean peninsula to danger line and a touch-and-go situation is prevailing there. 
					
					It called on all Koreans in the CIS to turn out in the nation-wide and sacred patriotic war for defending the nation's sovereignty and dignity from the U.S. and other hostile forces' dangerous moves to ignite a war and thus perform their noble mission and historic responsibility as its members.
					
					It underscored need for them to positively join the people in the homeland in the all-people resistance and the sacred patriotic war of justice for  reunification to contribute to building  a reunified and prosperous nation, the most powerful nation in the world, on the land of three thousand-ri.
					
					It voiced full support and solidarity to the appeal of the DFRK Central Committee that calls upon all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to join in the sacred patriotic war and resolutely foil the war moves of the provocateurs.

articles.title: Chongryon Vice-Chairman Calls for Patriotic War for Reunification
articles.content:
Chongryon Vice-Chairman Calls for Patriotic War for Reunification
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Vice-Chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Pae Ik Ju Friday released a statement titled "All Koreans in Japan will turn out in just and patriotic war for reunification".
					The statement said the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea on March 17 made public an "appeal to all Koreans" in which it called on all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to resolutely foil the war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers and turn out in a just and patriotic war for defending the destiny of the nation irrespective of differing ideology, ism, class, stratum, sex and age.
					
					The appeal was a timely and just patriotic initiative that aroused all the Koreans to the nationwide struggle to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and achieve the peace and reunification of the country under the prevailing grave situation reminiscent of the eve of a war, it noted.
					
					The U.S. and its followers desperately tried to encroach on the sovereignty of the DPRK and the nation's right to existence over the successful launch of Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and the third nuclear test that demonstrated the nation's wisdom and resourcefulness all over the world, the statement said. It stressed that these nefarious acts are an intolerable insult and a hideous challenge to all the Koreans.
					
					All facts prove that the U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean nation and the on-going all-out actions for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation is a showdown between the Korean nation and the U.S.
					
					Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan will turn out in a courageous patriotic action to foil the U.S. and south Korean warlike group's reckless confrontation and war moves, defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and achieve national reunification.
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers should immediately stop confrontation and war moves, clearly understanding that the reckless nuclear war provocation racket will precipitate their destruction.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Russian public circles for celebrating the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Russia on March 18.
					The preparatory committee chaired by Victor Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, comprises prominent figures of each political party, organization and institution.
					
					The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including seminar, meeting, lecture, film show and photo exhibition on the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Serbia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Serbia
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A Serbian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Belgrade on March 18.
					The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the glorious revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung and his  immortal exploits from March 18 to April 15.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Bangladesh for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Dakha on Mar. 18 under the co-sponsorship of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the Bangladesh People's League and the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee.
					MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the friendship and solidarity committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events including meeting, seminar, film show and photo exhibition to laud the immortal exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted a special write-up on its website on March 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The website in an article titled "Human cause of independence and President Kim Il Sung" said:
					
					Kim Il Sung is deeply revered by the Korean people and world progressive mankind not only as the eternal President of the DPRK but as a great pioneer of the human cause of independence.
					
					He provided the guidelines for accomplishing the cause of independence on the basis of the Juche idea and the Songun idea, set a practical example for the national liberation struggle in colonies and positively helped the world oppressed people in their struggle.
					
					He also energetically led the international socialist movement.
					
					He will live forever as he performed immortal exploits for the human cause of independence.
					
					The website in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, shining august name" noted that his august name shines as a symbol of national liberation and the era of independence, noble virtues and sense of obligation.
					
					It introduced in detail the fact that he helped the people of the developing countries in their struggle for building a new society materially and morally and made a great contribution to achieving global independence.
					
					It stressed that the banner of independence held aloft by him serves still now as a powerful driving force instilling great strength and courage into the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Iran
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was brought out in booklet by the Hadian Publishing House of Iran on March 18.
					The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetime.
					
					It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to resolutely defend and preserve their ideas and feats and eternally glorify them.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported in Venezuela
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported in Venezuela
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A lecture on the situation on the Korean Peninsula took place at the meeting room of the mutual security fund of minor enterprises of Venezuela on March 13.
					Present there were figures of the Venezuela-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, the Human Rights Federation of Venezuela and the National Leadership of the Venezuela Revolutionary Movement, personages of organizations for the study of the Juche idea and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and masses.
					
					A lecture on the recent situation on the Korean Peninsula was given to be followed by speeches of the head of the friendship parliamentary group, the chairman of the federation and other figures.
					
					The speakers said that they were pleased with the signal successes made by the DPRK despite the moves of the U.S. to stifle it and threat of aggression, adding that the struggle of the Korean people is greatly encouraging the people of Latin America including Venezuela in their anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle. 
					
					They noted that the Venezuelan people are learning a lot from the Korean people who have defended and victoriously advanced the cause of socialism, upholding the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea under the wise leadership of the great leaders.
					
					They went on:
					
					It is important to strengthen mutual support and solidarity between the peoples of the two countries to achieve the common aim of the struggle against imperialism and the U.S. and for socialism. We will dynamically struggle to firmly defend and accomplish the cause of the Bolivarian revolution pioneered by President Chavez and positively support the Korean people in their just cause of standing up firm against the frantic moves of the imperialist reactionaries.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported by Organizations of Slovenia, Uganda
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported by Organizations of Slovenia, Uganda
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Slovenian and Ugandan organizations expressed full support to the statements of the spokesmen for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					The Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association on March 10 said that a grave situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					It said:
					
					The U.S. seeks to ignite a war of aggression under the berets of "UN Forces" after prodding the UN Security Council into cooking up a "resolution" for justifying the war. 
					
					The association regards the U.S. as the arch criminal threatening global peace and security. It fully supports the statements of the spokesmen for the Supreme Command of the KPA and the DPRK Foreign Ministry and extends firm solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle.
					
					The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement in a statement on March 15 expressed full support to supreme leader Kim Jong Un and the Korean people.
					
					It went on:
					
					The world recognizes that the DPRK's satellite launch and nuclear test were just measures to develop science and technology of the country, promote its economic development and bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence from A to Z.
					
					Korea's reunification should be achieved according to the three principles of national reunification.
					
					The Korean people will overcome any trial and difficulties and achieve the reunification of the country without fail.

articles.title: DPRK's Third Underground Nuclear Test Supported by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Third Underground Nuclear Test Supported by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article on its website on March 14 to support the third underground nuclear test of the DPRK.
					The article referred to the nuclear test the DPRK conducted to cope with the hostile acts of the U.S. who infringed upon its legitimate right to satellite launch, adding:
					
					The nuclear test of the DPRK was entirely a just step for self-defence.
					
					It is quite natural that the DPRK responded to the augmenting nuclear threat by the U.S. with its own nuclear deterrent.
					
					The U.S. and other permanent members of the UN Security Council are responsible for most of the nuclear tests and satellite launches in the world.
					
					But they fabricated a "resolution" banning the DPRK from a nuclear test or a satellite launch. It is the height of double-standards.
					
					The article queried how the UNSC could take issue with a sovereign state's exercise of its just right to self-defence and its peaceful scientific and technological activities had the former considered even a bit about upholding the international justice and fairness as its life and cornerstone of all its activities.
					
					It went on:
					
					Why doesn't the UNSC take issue with the U.S. policy of preemptive nuclear strike that poses biggest threat to the world peace and security?
					
					Humankind are lamenting over the UNSC's behavior of patronizing with a cover of "international legality" the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. which has been engrossed in invasion and intervention in other countries.
					
					As long as the U.S. comes out hostile toward the DPRK, complicating the situation, the latter will take second and third stronger countermeasures in succession.
					
					Comb-out of the DPRK's ships and naval blockade against it called for by the U.S. and its allies will be regarded as an act of war and entail the DPRK's merciless retaliatory strike upon their strongholds.

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand Given Publicity Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand Given Publicity Abroad
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's principled stand against the hostile moves of the U.S. and its allies was given publicity by various countries and a regional organization between Mar. 14 and 18.
					The Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) in the March issue of its organ Line of March extended support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people for defending the country's sovereignty from imperialism. It carried the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army "Final victory is in store for the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are all out for protecting sovereignty" and the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Mar. 9 regarding a new anti-DPRK "resolution on sanctions" adopted by the UNSC.
					
					Media of various countries and organizations gave publicity to the answer given by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry which declared that the DPRK is not bound to the Armistice Agreement any longer under the prevailing grave situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					They included the website of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, Russian internet magazines including Hanber Journal and Mar 12, an Ukrainian internet paper, the Nepalese paper Nepal Today and websites of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions.
					
					The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK's Ministry of the People's Armed Forces "The warmongers of south Korean puppet military authorities will never be able to escape severe punishment for kicking up war hysteria".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona Unidad 1973 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona Unidad 1973 del EPC
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono el dia 22 la comandancia de la unidad 1973 del EPC galardonada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Tras dar como recuerdo a una subunidad adscrita directamente a la unidad, binoculos, fusil automatico y ametralladora, el Comandante Supremo tomo foto junto con los uniformados.
					
					Luego de escuchar por parte de los oficiales las explicaciones sobre el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion, edificado para transmitir para siempre las hazanas inmortales del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien realizo el 23 de mayo de 2003 una  visita a la unidad, recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					Al decir que el 30 de noviembre de 2011, ultimo periodo de su vida, el Dirigente vio el entrenamiento de batalla en la calle de la unidad, recordo aquel dia inolvidable en que le acompanaba al campo de ejercicio.
					
					Subrayo que la unidad debe glorificar las imborrables hazanas de los Generalisimos con la reluciente victoria en la gran guerra por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Evaluo altamente las proezas de la unidad que apoyaba a la cabeza la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					Recalco que los Generalisimos prestaron gran importancia a esta unidad y el mismo tambien la aprecia mucho y anadio que la inspecciona con el gran proposito.
					
					Dio vuelta por la casa de los militares, la biblioteca y el lugar de educacion en el espiritu de heroes.
					
					En la biblioteca el Mariscal miro atentamente las fotos de los ejemplares lectores y evaluo el esmerado uso de la biblioteca.
					
					En el lugar de educacion en el espiritu de heroes donde estuvo el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un recibio el informe de que la unidad cuenta con 189 Heroes de la RPDC y del Trabajo, 19 premiados con Premio Reunificacion de la Patria y 21 companias heroinas y senalo que la unidad debe ser en el futuro la unidad heroina en la batalla que abre la brecha en la gran batalla por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					En la casa de los militares, el Mariscal dijo que la unidad debe seguir dando prioridad a la educacion politica e ideologica de los uniformados para prepararlos como los fuertes en la idea y la conviccion armados con el espiritu de defender a la patria socialista y como patrulla y peloton suicida en la batalla por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Al preguntar como se imparte la educacion en la Universidad Politica O Jung Hup, enseno las cuestiones que se presentan en establecer correctamente el programa didactico conforme a las caracteristicas del plantel docente y mejorar la composicion de profesores y la capacidad de estos.
					
					Para cumplir plenamente con su mision de combatir en la zona enemiga, los militares deben prepararse tanto en lo tecnico-militar y fisico como en lo politico e ideologico, instruyo.
					
					Viendo en el aula de leccion militar el panorama topografico de la zona enemiga y el plan operacional de la unidad, escucho el parte detallado del jefe de la unidad sobre el proceso de cumplimiento de la mision de operacion y el estado de ejercicios de la unidad.
					
					Diciendo que la unidad asume la importante mision de ocupar el baluarte de los enemigos, enfatizo que si estalla la guerra, ella debe arremeter como relampago contra la parte centrica de los enemigos y asaltar de un tiron las instalaciones militares y los organos de dominacion reaccionaria del Sur de Corea, subrayo.
					
					Dio la indicacion de definir correctamente los blancos principales de ataque y tomar en cuenta todas las instalaciones importantes.
					
					Subrayo que tras trazar bien el programa de ejercicios acorde a las caracteristicas de la mision asumida, la unidad debe realizar los ejercicios como combate real con el fin de preparar a los combatientes para que puedan actuar libremente en la zona enemiga en el tiempo de guerra.
					
					Mientras recorria el mismo dia una subunidad directamente adscrita a la unidad, el Mariscal enfatizo que se debe atender bien las condiciones de vida de los uniformados que deben combatir en la zona enemiga.
					
					Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los oficiales y soldados de la unidad demostraran el temperamento del heroico EPC en la batalla de vida o muerte con los enemigos y defenderan fidedignamente la valiosa patria socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta inspeccion Choe Ryong Hae, Hwang Pyong So y Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia regalos a participantes en caminata de mil ries para estudio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia regalos a participantes en caminata de mil ries para estudio
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio regalos a los ninos escolares que realizan la caminata de mil ries para el estudio por la misma ruta recorrida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					El Mariscal instruyo organizar esa marcha para que los ninos escolares recordaran la vida revolucionaria y hazanas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y les envio regalos por avion.
					
					Los integrantes de la marcha partieron el dia 16 de Phophyong y llegaron el dia 23 a Songwon, siguiendo las huellas dejadas por el Presidente y el camino recorrido por el Dirigente.
					
					Tuvo lugar en el terreno la ceremonia de entrega de regalos.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Ri Yong Su, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Jon Yong Nam, presidente del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios interesados y los marchantes.
					
					Quedaron entregados los regalos y hubo intervenciones.

articles.title: EE.UU. no puede eludir la responsabilidad por crisis actual, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. no puede eludir la responsabilidad por crisis actual, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos agrava mas la crisis de confrontacion tergiversando justas contramedidas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para defender la soberania como "provocacion" y "amenaza". 
					En estos tiempos, las autoridades de alto rango de EE.UU. insisten en que debido a las contramedidas de la RPDC, se ven amenazadas la paz y estabilidad de la region y se crea la tension en la Peninsula Coreana, diciendo que "se preocupan por las palabras belicosas del Norte de Corea (RPDC) que desacreditan los esfuerzos de la sociedad internacional por consolidar la paz y estabilidad". 
					
					Esto es una sofisteria que invierte la verdad para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad por la crisis actual y fomentar en ambito mundial el ambiente de presion y sancion anti-RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. es el autor que fabrico la sancion de la ONU calificando de ilegal el lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC de cara al desarrollo economico pacifico e impulso a ella a tomar contramedidas intransigentes como la prueba nuclear subterranea y la anulacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea. 
					
					Pese a la reiterada advertencia de la RPDC, el imperio desarrolla los ejercicios belicos de gran envergadura llevando a la fase de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					EE.UU. es el provocador y perturbador de la paz y estabilidad que impone de siglo en siglo los sufrimientos y desgracias al pueblo coreano recurriendo persistentemente a la sancion y la amenaza anti-RPDC.
					
					En visperas de la prueba nuclear de la RPDC, que EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles califican de "provocacion" y toman por pretexto de "sancion", se realizo en la academia militar de fuerzas terrestres de EE.UU. el simulacro denominado "2013 War Game" para aplastar con la fuerza a la RPDC.
					
					Desde 1976, en suelo surcoreano los aviones norteamericanos U-2 y cientos de aviadores vigilan casi todos los dias las comunicaciones militares, el traslado de unidades y los preparativos de las pruebas de armas nucleares y misiles de la RPDC. 
					
					Hasta ahora en que la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en la coyuntura a punto de guerra total, EE.UU. desarrolla publicamente los ejercicios de ataque nuclear contra la RPDC movilizando cazabombarderos estrategicos, submarinos de propulsion nuclear y otros medios de ataque nuclear bajo el rotulo de "hacer frente rotundo con la fuerza".
					
					La introduccion de "tres pilares nucleares", "tres medios de ataque nuclear", de EE.UU. y sus palabras belicosas devienen abierto chantaje nuclear y maxima amenaza a la RPDC. 
					
					En el territorio coreano llego la era de confrontacion nuclear por culpa de EE.UU. 
					
					Su consecuencia catastrofica no azotara unicamente la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					EE.UU. no puede eludir la responsabilidad por el respecto.

articles.title: ACNC critica la campana anticoreana de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
ACNC critica la campana anticoreana de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los reaccionarios japoneses arrecian mas que antes la campana de confrontacion anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El director del secretariado del gabinete dijo en entrevista de prensa que "estrecharia la red de cerco anti-RPDC" mientras el jefe de la Junta de Estado Mayor de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" peroro que "hara todo lo posible en la vigilancia" a la RPDC hablando de la "violacion a la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU".
					
					Esto es un lamento de quienes estan atemorizados ante la voluntad de reaccion intransigente de la RPDC y una manifestacion del intento de recrudecer la campana anti-RPDC sumandose a la politica hostil de Estados Unidos.
					
					Tales disparates coinciden con la presentacion al Senado de EE.UU. del llamado "informe anual" que ha descrito el ejercicio del derecho de autodefensa de la RPDC como "provocacion" y "amenaza".
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses practicaron obstinadamente en el pasado la campana conflictiva con la RPDC siendo complices activos en la politica hostil de EE.UU. a ella.
					
					Los politicos conservadores de Japon como el director del secretariado del gabinete y el jefe de la Junta de Estado Mayor de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" son capaces de cualquier cosa para adular a su amo gringo y elevar su popularidad.
					
					El premier japones Abe esta al frente de la demagogia anticoreana.
					
					El dijo que "seria bueno para la RPDC no subestimar las palabras de EE.UU. y cambiar su politica" y para colmo, se atrevio a mencionar el supuesto "arruinamiento" de la RPDC.
					
					Tales dichos son tan vulgares e indecentes para ser pronunciados por un jefe de Estado.
					
					Cuando numerosos paises del mundo apoyan el ejercicio de derecho de autodefensa de la RPDC, ese premier del pais vecino expone abiertamente su hostilidad y arraigada conciencia conflictiva.
					
					Esto muestra su conciencia de confrontacion anti-RPDC y su baja personalidad.
					
					Es tan absurdo el disparate de Abe sobre el "arruinamiento" y el "cambio de politica" de alguien.
					
					Las medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC son las justas tomadas frente a las ilegales hostilidades de EE.UU. y el CS de la ONU que han negado el legitimo derecho de lanzamiento del satelite y la prueba nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					Habria que poner en entredicho su cualidad como jefe de Estado si el no supiera esa verdad.
					
					Japon, que intenta repetir la sangrienta historia del pasado y acelera la conversion en potencia militar con el lanzamiento del satelite espia y otros, critica de una manera u otra las medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC, lo cual es un atentado contra la soberania nacional de otro pais.
					
					Es una tragedia para Japon que los politicos incapaces como Abe estuvieran en la cima del poder.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea no perdonaran jamas, como hicieron en el pasado, a los que ofendan la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y hagan chismes sobre las medidas de esta para la defensa de soberania.
					
					Abe y otros politicos japoneses continuan con su chismografia pensando que pueden estar fuera del alcance de ataque de la RPDC, seran arruinados mas pronto.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun desmiente rumor de "provocacion del Norte"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun desmiente rumor de "provocacion del Norte"
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos difunden el rumor de la supuesta "provocacion del Norte (de Corea)" para justificar su criminal "sancion" y belicismo anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, eludir la responsabilidad de la grave situacion actual y eliminar la idea y el regimen de esta, y continua:
					Ese rumor es un sofisma para ocultar la ambicion de agredir a la RPDC al desatar la nueva guerra.
					
					Los actos provocativos los cometen ellos mismos que aplican la inaudita "sancion" economica contra la RPDC y la presionan cuestionando el ejercicio de su derecho soberano. De esta manera, ellos crean el extremado peligro de guerra movilizando enormes fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Dominar toda la Corea tomando el Sur de Corea como cabeza de puente para la realizacion de su estrategia de hegemonia mundial es la invariable ambicion del imperio.
					
					Para justificar la ocupacion y el dominio del Sur de Corea, EE.UU. difunde mas que nunca el rumor de la "provocacion del Norte" pretextando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial y la prueba nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					La banda titere surcoreana se suma al designio de su amo norteamericano de ocupar para siempre el territorio surcoreano y provocar la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					Ante la grave realidad de hoy, todos los connacionales y la humanidad pacifista calan bien el caracter enganoso del rumor en cuestion.
					
					Este rumor tendra como desenlace la tragica autodestruccion de EE.UU. y sus titeres surcoreanos.
